input.sentences: we finally arrived after a long 16 hour flight .
the people were all friendly and we made a lot of new friends with strangers .
they showed us around some of the neater places which every tourist should see .
we saw statues of lions and that was really the highlight of our trip .
this town is lovely but it 's time to go back home .
output.sentences: My flight landed and I still got daylight.
Seems that I wasn't the only one who wanted to visit this place.
There's so many tourists at this time of year.
These lion statues seem to ward them off.
I love visiting this beautiful city.
